strings.Value: "You're not human and you never will be! You're nothing more than a disgusting parody."
[Attack] "A monster is always a monster. I'll free my lands from your kind!"
{n}At the ruined gates of {g|Trobold}Trobold{/g}, you see Jazon walking alone. Seeing you, he waves his hand.{/n} "Hello, borba. Why you come here?"
{n}Jazon shakes his head.{/n} "Borba killed trolls, but it wasn't borba who started war. Hargulka wanted war, got what he wanted. {g|Trobold}Trobold{/g} fell because of its king."
"Jazon lives here. {g|Trobold}Trobold{/g} is no more, but stone walls still stand. Plenty of space, plenty of food in woods. Plenty of time to think."

"No. Jazon does as he decided. No attacking people in villages. Eats only forest borba â€” deer, boar, but not people. Jazon wash his fur, brush his fangs. {g|Trobold}Trobold{/g} is no more, but Jazon is still Jazon."

"Me Jazon. Had another name before. Like other trolls, went hunting, ate borba. Then Tartuk came, talked to trolls. Explained how humans live. Jazon not as smart as Tartuk, but Jazon saw... humans live better. Jazon stop eating humans, started wash his fur and brush his fangs. Other trolls said Jazon was crazy. Now other trolls are no more. Only Jazon left."

{n}Jazon bares his teeth and roars. For a moment, it seems like he's about to charge you, but he instead pounds the nearest rock with his fist, sending rock shards flying.{/n} "Don't say so, borba! Jazon give everything to be Jazon! Jazon won't go back!"
